summary: An Ordinance providing for the laying off, widening, altering, and establishing of Lakeside Avenue, from East Jefferson Street to Lake Dell Avenue; and providing for the changing of the use of said Lakeside Avenue, from East Jefferson Street to Lake Dell Avenue; and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the payment for the same be made from the Park Fund of the City of Seattle.
